title: Pizza Bite
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Delivery/take-out only pizza shop offering vegan choices including several pizzas clearly marked vegan and vegan mozzarella and parmesan. Also serves pasta, salads, and a vegan burger. Note: A blogger in Athens personally spoke with the chef/owner who confirmed that the dough and vegan cheeses were purely vegan. Address:  Αγίων Πάντων 55 , Καλλιθέα
